title: Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This Five-story Building!!
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

Walk to the rear patio and discover the perfect space for creating your very own outdoor entertainment area. Upstairs on the second floor you will find a large bathroom with custom shelving, monochromatic tile and a floating vanity sink. Two sizable bedrooms await you upstairs as well, with abundant closet space for all. The custom board and batten woodwork in the master bedroom creates a gorgeous dwelling. The second bedroom is impressive as well, with a lovely accent wall and a large closet. Venture downstairs to find a fully finished basement, perfect for additional living space. This floor also features a remodeled half bathroom with chic tiling, as well as new front-load washer and dryer in the laundry area. The new central AC and heater will keep you comfortable all year round. Now, let's talk about location: close proximity to restaurants in Pennsport, Dickinson Narrows, Passyunk Square, Lower Moyamensing, and a stone's throw to Mifflin Square Park. This home is close to multiple lines of public transportation, making it convenient for commuting or to enjoy all of the local dining and shopping Philadelphia has to offer. Easy access to I-95, I-76 and the sports complex, as well as the Walt Whitman and Ben Franklin bridges. Schedule your appointment today!

title: sun-filled 5 bedroom, 2 bath twin home
description:
Welcome to 505 W Mount Pleasant: a sun-filled 5 bedroom, 2 bath twin home in the heart of sought-after West Mount Airy. A welcoming front porch gives a wonderful first impression and provides a perfect place to relax and enjoy the neighborhood. Inside, the open concept living and dining area has plenty of space for living and entertaining. The large kitchen has ample cabinet and counter space, and offers a view onto the generous, fenced rear yard. This outdoor space is one of the features that drew the current owners to this home, and it’s easy to see why! With patio, lawn and raised garden beds, there’s scope for all your outdoor activities: dining, recreation and gardening  The second floor of the home includes a large bedroom at the front and two further bedrooms, one previously used as a study, as well as the full bath with shower/tub combination. Level three contains two additional sunny bedrooms. Hardwood flooring in all living areas is a true perk, as well as a full basement for all your storage needs. This home has been loved and well cared for by the current owners and is a freshly painted blank canvas for you to update, combine spaces or just move right in! Located in a highly walkable and friendly neighborhood, steps away from Carpenter’s Woods, and less than ½ mile from the High Point coffee shop, Weavers Way Coop, Wissahickon trails and Septa commuter rail. Many of the restaurants, shops, schools and cafes Mt. Airy has on offer are just a short walk away. All photos with furniture have been digitally staged.

title: Welcome to 530 S 2nd St Fully Furnished Condo in Beautiful Condition!
description:
Welcome to 530 South 2nd Street, Unit 819 a fully furnished condo in beautiful condition! Walk into a newly renovated open concept kitchen, finished with new hardware and cabinetry designed for maximum storage. The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this penthouse unit in Abbotts Square your next home. Owner is related to the listing agent.
530-10 S 2nd St #819

title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! This is a quick walk to La Chinesca, Café Lift, Yards Brewery, Love City Brewery, Triple Bottom Brewery, Lucky Well, Juno, Reading Terminal, the newly built rail park, and many many more great establishments/destinations!

title: Fabulous home 3bd/1.5bth House for rent
description: Fabulous home in one of the most desired neighborhoods in Montgomery county. Walk up to a beautifully lush front yard with a welcoming, spacious front porch. Enter into the main floor living room with sparkling hardwood floors, plenty of natural sunlight and a wood-burning brick fireplace. Continue through the open floor plan into the dining room with a picture window and unique light fixture open to the newly renovated kitchen. The kitchen has gorgeous cabinetry, a new countertop and custom built-in pantry wall cabinets. On the main floor, you will also find 3 bedrooms, each with ceiling fans and ample closets. The main floor full bath has a tub/shower combo and built-in storage. From the kitchen you can exit into the spacious, back yard with an attached deck and flagstone patio. Or you can head down to the basement where you will find a newly installed half bath and a large, well-lit laundry room. The remainder of the basement has plenty of room for storage or extra play room. The property has a single car width driveway that can fit 2 cars easily and custom wrought iron gates into the back yard. The best part of the property is the neighborhood. You would be less than a 300 foot walk to the center of Keswick Village where you will find a well stocked grocer (O'Neill's), a diner, several pubs and restaurants, and the one-of-a-kind Keswick Theater. You are a 10 minute walk to the Glenside SEPTA train station served by the Airport Line, Doylestown/Warminster, and West Trenton lines and steps from a Bus Line 22 stop.

title: 3Bed 2 1/2 Bath Townhouse - BUTLER PARK CONDOMINIUMS
description: Located a block from Butler & Bethlehem Pike in the popular Upper Dublin School District, this townhouse features many desireable benefits!  Walk 30 yards for summertime swimming pool (included in rent) or stroll 15 minutes to see a show or dine in downtown Ambler! Need an easy lifestyle? Your designated & open parking is right in front of your home;  the condo association takes care of plowing, mowing, general landscaping and even pays your water/sewer bills. Want nice features in your home? This townhouse features beautiful, engineered wood floors and handsome tile floors (Kitchen, bathrooms & foyer). The updated Kitchen has generous storage with pull-out drawers, plentiful solid-surface counterspace and room for a table & chairs. The attractive stone backsplash really pops when the under-cabinet lighting goes on. All the desired appliances are there: dishwasher, garbage disposal. range and refrigerator with icemaker. You will see no one peering into your large, open Living Room/Dining Room through the sliding glass doors, because of the retaining wall and above it, the grassy knoll of the adjacent building's side wall. There is some nice outside family space (covered patio, small yard & storage closet) to enjoy just beyond those doors. A convenient Powder Room, is tucked away off the foyer entryway. The wall of closet/storage area is sandwiched between the kitchen & the staircase. Upstairs, the Primary Bedroom features two double closets and a walk-in closet, as well as a renovated Primary Bathroom with stall shower. The other two Bedrooms share the bright Hall Bathroom, as well as views of the woods & creek that lie beyond your parking spots. Steps from these Bedrooms lies the very convenient Laundry closet (new washer & dryer). Tenant pays only cable,  electric and renters insurance. There is one assigned spot and abundant extra parking. The pool is open to residents & guests and the clubhouse is available for renting. This townhouse provides an easy, convenient & attractive lifestyle for busy people who want to enjoy their time doing what they want to do. Come see if this might be the right choice for you!

title: Best in Brewerytown living! 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt + parking space!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.
Features:
Central Air/Heat
Washer Dryer

2 entrances

Gas stove
3 full bathrooms
Tons of natural light

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: 24/7 emergency maintenance service, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
